name: forms-md
tagline: A self-hosted form builder that turns Markdown into shareable surveys
description: FormsMD is a self-hosted Markdown-based form builder. It turns MD-like syntax into shareable forms with submissions tracked via a lightweight backend, making it ideal for simple surveys or feedback collection without external dependencies.

features.title: Form Submissions
features.description: Collect and store responses submitted through forms

features.title: Web Form Rendering
features.description: Render Markdown forms as interactive web forms

features.title: Submission Review
features.description: View submitted form responses in a web interface

features.title: Lightweight Setup
features.description: Run the form service with minimal configuration

features.title: Self-Hosted Deployment
features.description: Run the form system on your own infrastructure
